name: Phone Speed Booster - Junk Removal and Optimizer
description: Speed Booster & Junk Cleaner for Android is one of the best memory optimizing and task managing apps on the marketplace! Speed up your device with just one click as Speed Booster & Junk Cleaner cleans up junk files, frees storage, optimizes RAM, and much more. Its a simple yet effective way to boost your phone, and all it takes is one tap to start cleaning!  What makes Speed Booster & Junk Cleaner a must-have app for accelerating your phone? Along with its easy to use interface, Speed Booster & Junk Cleaner comes with all the features you need to optimize and boost your devices performance:   Basic Features:   Trash Cleaner - Clean out obsolete, unnecessary, and junk files. Great for freeing up precious storage space on your device.  Phone Speed Booster - Close background tasks you dont need to free up RAM. Instantly speeds up your device.  App Manager - Move or uninstall apps with ease. Clears out storage space for more apps!  Startup Manager - Boost your phones startup time by removing unnecessary apps from the list.   All of Speed Booster & Junk Cleaners features are available to run using just a single tap. Clean search histories, remove junk files, boost RAM, and more, all you have to do is touch and youre done! You can even set up automated tasks to kill memory hogs without lifting a finger.  Advanced features that help your phone stay fast and clean:  Download Manager - Show files downloaded from the internet so you can remove them to free up space.  Ignore List - Let important apps stay active while you clean up the rest.  Advanced Cleaner - Clean more efficiently by checking device history, call logs, and large files.   Notifications - Get a notification when storage or memory is low.   Speed booster is focused on cleaning your phone and optimizing it for peak performance. Get the best free clean master for your android phone. Speed booster is focused on doing one thing, cleaning your phone, freeing up ram, deleting files, boosting your phone, in short a real junk cleaner. If you want a multi-function battery saver, applock, and antivirus built into one, then Speed Booster & Junk cleaner is not the one. Enjoy the small file size, optimized performance with the best free junk cleaner today to speed up your phone. What are you waiting for, download the top speed cleaner today.
